jyay2dug.name: Bellota
jyay2dug.description: A menudo se encuentran en el suelo cerca de los árboles. Las ardillas adoran esta tuerca, por lo que puede tener competencia mientras se alimenta. Añadir uno a una comida para un condimento de nuez.

jyay2duh.name: Ámbar
jyay2duh.description: Una resina fosilizada con brillo caramelesco. Se ha valorado como un componente en decoraciones y artesanía desde la antigüedad.

jyay2dui.name: Núcleo Ancestral
jyay2dui.description: Este cristal fue hecho usando tecnología perdida. Hubo un tiempo en que fue la fuente de energía para las máquinas antiguas. Este artículo es muy valioso para los investigadores.

jyay2duj.name: Engranaje Ancestral
jyay2duj.description: Un engranaje usado en maquinaria antigua. A pesar de ser increíblemente viejo, su calidad de construcción está muy por encima de cualquier cosa construida con la tecnología actual.

jyay2duk.name: Tornillo Ancestral
jyay2duk.description: Un tornillo utilizado en maquinaria antigua. Está hecho de un material desconocido, y no importa cuántas veces se gire, sus hilos nunca parecen mostrar signos de desgaste.

jyay2dul.name: Eje Ancestral
jyay2dul.description: Una pieza de la máquina utilizada en maquinaria antigua. Es increíblemente resistente y no está hecho de ningún material reconocible. Puede ser útil algún día.

jyay2dum.name: Primavera Ancestral
jyay2dum.description: Un muelle utilizado en maquinaria antigua. Es lo suficientemente ligero y flotante como para flotar en el agua, y no importa cuántas veces se comprima, nunca pierde la tensión.

jyay2dun.name: Manzana
jyay2dun.description: Una fruta común que se encuentra en los árboles alrededor de Hyrule. Cómalo fresco o cocínelo para aumentar su efecto.

jyay2duo.name: Armoranto
jyay2duo.description: Esta dura planta medicinal no se puede romper, pero se puede cocinar. Sus fibras duraderas y flexibles elevan su defensa cuando se cocinan en un plato.

jyay2dup.name: Carpa Blindada
jyay2dup.description: Los depósitos de calcio en las escamas de este pez antiguo los hacen tan duros como una armadura. Cocinarlo en un plato fortalecerá tus huesos, aumentando temporalmente tu defensa.

jyay2duq.name: Porgy Blindado
jyay2duq.description: El cuerpo de este cerdo está cubierto de escamas resistentes a las armaduras. Los compuestos en sus escalas, cuando se cocinan en un plato, fortalecen sus huesos y aumentan temporalmente su defensa.

jyay2dur.name: Rábano Caluroso Grande
jyay2dur.description: Este rábano abundante ha crecido mucho más grande que el rábano promedio. Es rico en compuestos analépticos que, cuando se cocinan en un plato, aumentan temporalmente sus corazones máximos.

jyay2dus.name: Gran Trufa Calurosa
jyay2dus.description: Los años de no ser elegidos han permitido que esta trufa abundante crezca bastante. Está lleno de nutrientes. Cuando se cocina en un plato, aumenta temporalmente tus corazones máximos.

jyay2dut.name: Huevo de ave
jyay2dut.description: Un huevo de ave fresco necesario para hacer platos como tortillas y crepes. Puedes engancharlos de los nidos de pájaros si eres astuto. Nutritiva y deliciosa, perfecta.

jyay2duu.name: Escarabajo de rinoceronte
jyay2duu.description: Las astas afiladas de este escarabajo exigen que lo manejes con cuidado. Hierve los cuernos a lo largo de las partes de los monstruos para crear un elixir que aumentará tu poder de ataque.

jyay2duv.name: Sombra Nocturna Azul
jyay2duv.description: Una planta que crece en zonas más tranquilas de Hyrule. Por la noche, desprende un suave resplandor. Cocine con él para aumentar su sigilo.

jyay2duw.name: Colmillo De Bokoblin
jyay2duw.description: Un diente obtenido de un Bokoblin. Está desgastado y no muy afilado, pero sigue siendo bastante difícil. Cocínalo junto a una criatura para hacer un elixir.

jyay2dux.name: Tripas De Bokoblin
jyay2dux.description: Un material raro obtenido al derrotar a un Bokoblin. Convulsiona por su cuenta de vez en cuando, lo que es realmente espeluznante, pero quizás tiene un uso.

jyay2duy.name: Cuerno de bokoblin
jyay2duy.description: El cuerno cortado de un Bokoblin, una criatura que se encuentra a menudo en las llanuras de Hyrule. No es comestible, pero se puede echar en un estofado con algunas criaturas para hacer un elixir.

jyay2duz.name: Cangrejo de ojos brillantes
jyay2duz.description: Este cangrejo aparece en grandes cantidades cuando llueve. Con un bocado de su deliciosa carne, olvidará todo su agotamiento. Llena tu resistencia cuando se cocina en un plato.

jyay2dv0.name: Caña de azucar
jyay2dv0.description: Cuando se hierve con otros ingredientes, la caña se descompone en un jugo dulce necesario para hacer pasteles y otros dulces. Se encuentra comúnmente en las tiendas de ingredientes.

jyay2dv1.name: Chickaloo tuerca de árbol
jyay2dv1.description: Los pájaros pequeños aman esta tuerca. Puedes comerlo crudo para un efecto menor, pero también se puede agregar como una especia a otras recetas.

jyay2dv2.name: Trucha De Chillfin
jyay2dv2.description: Esta trucha azul prefiere cuerpos fríos de agua. Su piel contiene enzimas que mantienen su cuerpo fresco, y cuando se cocina en un plato, aumentará temporalmente su resistencia al calor

jyay2dv3.name: Chillshroom
jyay2dv3.description: A menudo se encuentran en la base de los pinos en climas fríos, estos hongos son frescos al tacto y se pueden usar para cocinar platos que le permiten mantenerse fresco incluso en regiones áridas.

jyay2dv4.name: Jalea de chuchu
jyay2dv4.description: Una sustancia gelatinosa que provenía de un chuchu. Es inutilizable en este estado, pero la aplicación de un poco de estimulación elemental cambiará su forma.

jyay2dv5.name: Darner frío
jyay2dv5.description: Esta libélula prefiere la sombra fresca de los árboles al calor del sol. Sus alas dispersan el calor de su cuerpo, que puede cocinarse en un elixir resistente al calor.

jyay2dv6.name: Fresca safflina
jyay2dv6.description: Esta planta medicinal crece en elevaciones altas, como montañas en las regiones de Hebra o Gerudo. Cuando se cocina en un plato, aumentará temporalmente su resistencia al calor.

jyay2dv7.name: Courser Bee Honey
jyay2dv7.description: La miel directamente de la colmena está llena de nutrientes. Cocinar esto en una comida desbloquea el potencial de estos nutrientes y proporciona un efecto de recuperación de energía.

jyay2dv8.name: Diamante
jyay2dv8.description: La gema más preciosa que se puede encontrar en Hyrule, su brillo característico ha encantado a los Hyruleans durante generaciones. Como tal, se ha vendido a un precio muy alto desde la antigüedad.

jyay2dv9.name: Garra de Din
jyay2dv9.description: Esta valiosa garra fue arrancada del espíritu rojo Din. Hacía mucho calor antes de ser eliminado. Podrías venderlo en una tienda, pero debe tener otro uso.

jyay2dva.name: Escama Din
jyay2dva.description: Esta preciosa escala cayó del espíritu rojo Din. Emana un gran calor. Puedes usarlo para cocinar, pero comerlo parece un desperdicio.

jyay2dvb.name: Darner eléctrico
jyay2dvb.description: Esta rara libélula solo aparece bajo la lluvia. Sus alas dirigen la electricidad lejos de su cuerpo. Cocínalo con partes de monstruo para obtener un elixir resistente a la electricidad.

jyay2dvc.name: Ala Keese eléctrica
jyay2dvc.description: Un raro ala eléctrica de Keese. La parte del Keese eléctrico que produce electricidad no está en sus alas, por lo que no te sorprenderá. Lánzalo con algunas criaturas para hacer elixires.

jyay2dvd.name: Safflina eléctrica
jyay2dvd.description: Esta planta medicinal crece abundantemente en el desierto de Gerudo. Sus extrañas fibras conducen la electricidad, lo que aumentará su resistencia a la electricidad cuando se cocina en un plato.

jyay2dve.name: Escarabajo de rinoceronte enérgico
jyay2dve.description: Este valioso escarabajo puede vivir hasta diez años. Cuando se cocina con partes de monstruos, su impresionante vitalidad se traduce en un elixir que restaurará en gran medida su resistencia.

jyay2dvf.name: Zanahoria endura
jyay2dvf.description: Muy valorada como planta medicinal, esta zanahoria contiene grandes cantidades de energía nutritiva. Cuando se cocina en un plato, aumenta tu resistencia más allá de su límite máximo.

jyay2dvg.name: Endura Shroom
jyay2dvg.description: Un raro hongo amarillo-naranja. Cocínalo antes de comer para aumentar temporalmente tu límite de resistencia.

jyay2dvh.name: Hada
jyay2dvh.description: Este hada volará de tu bolsa y sanará todas tus heridas en el momento en que pierdas tu último corazón. Es fácil confundirlo con una luciérnaga al principio, pero brilla tanto a la luz del día como a la noche.

jyay2dvi.name: Garra de Faurone
jyay2dvi.description: Esta garra fue arrancada del espíritu dorado de Farosh. Su electricidad fue expulsada antes de ser retirada, por lo que es seguro manipularla. Una tienda lo comprará, pero debe tener algún otro uso.

jyay2dvj.name: Escama de Faurone
jyay2dvj.description: Esta preciosa balanza cayó del espíritu dorado de Farosh. Contiene poderosa electricidad en su interior. Puedes cocinarlo, pero comerlo parece un desperdicio.

jyay2dvk.name: Fire Keese Wing
jyay2dvk.description: Un raro ala de fuego Keese. No hay suficiente Fire Keese para quemarte, pero tiene un poco de calor. Puede ser utilizado como ingrediente para elixires.

jyay2dvl.name: Fireproof Lizard
jyay2dvl.description: This rare lizard can only be found in the Eldin region. Its scales have heat-resistant properties, so when cooked with monster parts, it produces a heat-resistant elixir.

jyay2dvm.name: Fleet-Lotus Seeds
jyay2dvm.description: The plant that bears these seeds grows near deep water. The roots draw nutrients from the water, which boosts your movement speed when the seeds are cooked into a dish.

jyay2dvn.name: Flint
jyay2dvn.description: Strike it with a metallic weapon to generate a spark. The portable fire starter breaks after one use, but it can create a long-lasting flame if you use it near firewood.

jyay2dvo.name: Fortified Pumpkin
jyay2dvo.description: An extremely tough pumpkin raised in village fields. When cooked, that toughness manifests itself by considerably upping defense.

jyay2dvp.name: Fresh Milk
jyay2dvp.description: This fresh milk comes from Hateno cows and white goats kept in the village. It's delicious on its own but can also be used as an ingredient in soups and stews.

jyay2dvq.name: Giant Ancient Core
jyay2dvq.description: A giant energy crystal made using lost ancient technology. Cores this large are an extremely rare find. A researcher would probably know how to use this.

jyay2dvr.name: Goat Butter
jyay2dvr.description: Butter made from the milk of a domesticated white goat. In addition to being used in dishes like stews and meunière. It's often used when making cakes and other sweets.

jyay2dvs.name: Goron Spice
jyay2dvs.description: Made from several types of spices, this secret Goron seasoning has been handed down for generations. An initial wave of spiciness paves the way for the sweetness.

jyay2dvt.name: Hearty Bass
jyay2dvt.description: This large fish lives near the shoreline. Its sizable body can restore a lot of nutrient. When cooked into a dish, it will temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

jyay2dvu.name: Hearty Blueshell Snail
jyay2dvu.description: This snail lives on sandy beaches in large numbers. Its flesh contains a high amount of stimulants, so when cooked into a dish, it temporarily increases your maximum hearts.

jyay2dvv.name: Hearty Durian
jyay2dvv.description: This fruit's odor earned it the nickname "king of fruits". It offers immense restorative power; dishes cooked with it will temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

jyay2dvw.name: Hearty Lizard
jyay2dvw.description: This rare lizard lives deep in the forests. It feeds on high-nutrient foods, giving it great vitality. When used to make elixirs, they temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

jyay2dvx.name: Hearty Radish
jyay2dvx.description: A rare radish that grows best in sunny plains. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

jyay2dvy.name: Hearty Salmon
jyay2dvy.description: This fish makes its home in cold water, giving it extra layers of fat. It temporarily increases your maximum hearts when used in cooking.

jyay2dvz.name: Hearty Truffle
jyay2dvz.description: This rare mushroom has a rich scent. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

jyay2dw0.name: Hightail Lizard
jyay2dw0.description: A lizard found throughout Hyrule. It's a bit slow to react at times, but if given a chance to escape, it will dart off quickly. Cook it with monster parts for a speed-boosting elixir.

jyay2dw1.name: Hinox Guts
jyay2dw1.description: A giant, smelly Hinox organ of unknown function. Upon closer inspection, it appears to be quivering, It can be used to make an elixir, but some say it has other uses, as well.

jyay2dw2.name: Hinox Toenail
jyay2dw2.description: A nail obtained from a Hinox. It's as thick as a plate of armor and can be stewed with critters to make elixirs.

jyay2dw3.name: Hinox Tooth
jyay2dw3.description: A tooth obtained from a Hinox. It's so large, it's hard to believe it's a real tooth. It can be used to make elixirs.

jyay2dw4.name: Hot-Footed Frog
jyay2dw4.description: A quick frog that can be found hopping around near water. Cook it with monster parts to draw out its speed-boost effect.

jyay2dw5.name: Hydromelon
jyay2dw5.description: This resilient fruit can flourish even in the heat of the desert. The hydrating liquid inside provides a cooling effect that, when cooked, increases your heat resistance.

jyay2dw6.name: Hylian Rice
jyay2dw6.description: This grain is a favorite among residents of Kakariko Village. It's grown in regions with a lot of water and is quite versatile. Used as an ingredient in things like risotto and rice balls.

jyay2dw7.name: Hylian Shroom
jyay2dw7.description: A common mushroom found near trees around Hyrule. Eat it to restore half a heart.

jyay2dw8.name: Hyrule Bass
jyay2dw8.description: An ordinary fish that can be found all over Hyrule. Can be eaten raw, but cooking it amplifies its healing benefits.

jyay2dw9.name: Hyrule Herb
jyay2dw9.description: This healthy herb grows abundantly in the plains of Hyrule. Cook it before eating to increase the number of hearts it restores.

jyay2dwa.name: Ice Keese Wing
jyay2dwa.description: A rare Ice Keese wing. Its frozen surface gleams attractively, but its usefulness isn't readily apparent.

jyay2dwb.name: Icy Lizalfos Tail
jyay2dwb.description: The severed tail of an Ice-Breath Lizalfos. Its hard scales and flesh make it unsuitable for cooking, but it's perfect for making elixirs.

jyay2dwc.name: Ironshell Crab
jyay2dwc.description: This crab's shell is particularly hard. When cooked into a dish, its fat and meat bolster the body to increase your defense.

jyay2dwd.name: Ironshroom
jyay2dwd.description: The cap of this mushroom is very hard. Use it when cooking to prepare a dish that increases your defense.

jyay2dwe.name: Keese Eyeball
jyay2dwe.description: A rare material dropped by a defeated Keese. It's fun to look at, but it doesn't seem to have much use at first glance. But it must be good for something...

jyay2dwf.name: Keese Wing
jyay2dwf.description: The wing of a Keese. It's covered with very short, sharp fur. It's not much use by itself, but you can mix it with critters to make something useful.

jyay2dwg.name: Lizalfos Horn
jyay2dwg.description: This winding horn once grew atop the head of a Lizalfos. It's too hard to use for cooking, but stores are willing to buy it from you. It can also be used to make elixirs.

jyay2dwh.name: Lizalfos Talon
jyay2dwh.description: This talon once grew from the elbow of a Lizalfos. You can stew it with critters to make elixirs, but it may have some other uses, as well.

jyay2dwi.name: Lizalfos Tail
jyay2dwi.description: The severed tail of a Lizalfos. It continues to wriggle even after being separated from its body. That kind of vitality makes it highly valued as an ingredient in elixirs.

jyay2dwj.name: Luminous Stone
jyay2dwj.description: This mysterious mineral gives off a pale blue glow in the dark, which some believe to be souls of the undead. Apparently, this stone can be used as a base to make special clothing.

jyay2dwk.name: Lynel Guts
jyay2dwk.description: This highly sought-after ingredient can only be obtained from a Lynel. It pulses with the vitality of a Lynel, a strength that makes it invaluable as an ingredient for elixirs.

jyay2dwl.name: Lynel Hoof
jyay2dwl.description: This rare ingredient can be obtained only from a Lynel's foot. It's larger and heavier than a horse's hoof. It's useful for making elixirs but may have uses beyond that.

jyay2dwm.name: Lynel Horn
jyay2dwm.description: The Lynel this horn once grew upon surely misses it. It's exceptionally hard—so hard that most blades cannot scratch it. Throw it into a stew with critters to make elixirs.

jyay2dwn.name: Mighty Bananas
jyay2dwn.description: This fruit grows mainly in tropical forests of the Faron region. When it's used as an ingredient, the resulting dish will temporarily increase your attack power.

jyay2dwo.name: Mighty Carp
jyay2dwo.description: This freshwater fish lives alongside its less mighty carp ilk. A compound in its liver promotes muscle growth. Dishes cooked with it will temporarily increase your attack power.

jyay2dwp.name: Mighty Porgy
jyay2dwp.description: This ocean-dwelling fish comes with one rude attitude. The compounds in its flesh elevate your competitive spirit when it's cooked into a dish, thus increasing your attack power.

jyay2dwq.name: Mighty Thistle
jyay2dwq.description: This medicinal plant is known for its sharp thorns and for the fruit it bears. The fruit contains a compound that increases attack power when cooked into a dish.

jyay2dwr.name: Moblin Fang
jyay2dwr.description: A sharp fang obtained from a Moblin. It's too hard to be reshaped into a tool, but it can be tossed into a stew with some critters to create elixirs.

jyay2dws.name: Moblin Guts
jyay2dws.description: This prized ingredient can be obtained from Moblins. Its odor is too pungent for normal food preparation, but stew it with some critters to make elixirs.

jyay2dwt.name: Moblin Horn
jyay2dwt.description: This splendid horn once grew atop the head of a Moblin. It can't be used in normal food recipes, but it does have some use as an ingredient in making elixirs.

jyay2dwu.name: Molduga Fin
jyay2dwu.description: A sturdy fin obtained from a Molduga. It can be used to make elixirs, but there may be someone willing to trade for it.

jyay2dwv.name: Molduga Guts
jyay2dwv.description: A giant organ obtained from a Molduga. This invaluable ingredient is hard to come by, and its use is shrouded in mystery.

jyay2dww.name: Monster Extract
jyay2dww.description: A result of Kilton's research into monsters, this suspicious spice can be used to punch up dishes while cooking. Apparently it can be used to make a number of monstrous meals.

jyay2dwx.name: Naydra's Claw
jyay2dwx.description: This valuable claw was plucked from the blue spirit Naydra. It was freezing cold before it was removed. You could sell it, but there must be some other use for it.

jyay2dwy.name: Naydra's Scale
jyay2dwy.description: This precious scale fell from the blue spirit Naydra. It contains a bitter cold within. You can use it in cooking, but just eating it seems like a waste.

jyay2dwz.name: Octo Balloon
jyay2dwz.description: This inflatable Octorok organ has a lot of lift, so attach it to items you want to see float. Hold it in your hands, and then place it on an object to attach it.

jyay2dx0.name: Octorok Eyeball
jyay2dx0.description: This can only be obtained from an Octorok-type enemy. You can sell it to a store, or you can make elixirs with it, but it may have other uses, as well.

jyay2dx1.name: Octorok Tentacle
jyay2dx1.description: This can only be obtained from an Octorok-type enemy. It's too acidic for cooking, but it's highly valued as an ingredient for elixirs.

jyay2dx2.name: Opal
jyay2dx2.description: A valuable ore that gives off a mesmerizing iridescence similar to the inside of a seashell. It contains the power of water.

jyay2dx3.name: Palm Fruit
jyay2dx3.description: Fruit from palm trees that grow near the ocean. It doesn't offer any special effects but will increase your heart recovery when used as an ingredient.

jyay2dx4.name: Raw Bird Thigh
jyay2dx4.description: A high-quality piece of meat that's hard to come by. You can eat it raw, but cooking it first will recover more hearts.

jyay2dx5.name: Raw Bird Drumstick
jyay2dx5.description: This meat is tougher and chewier than a standard steak. Tastes better cooked.

jyay2dx6.name: Raw Gourmet Meat
jyay2dx6.description: This prized cut of meat is usually from a large animal. Any connoisseur would rank this tender, juicy cut of meat "gourmet." Expect an exquisite meal when cooking with this.

jyay2dx7.name: Raw Meat
jyay2dx7.description: Meat obtained from animals in plains and forests. You can eat it raw, but cooking it will make it more delicious and nutritious.

jyay2dx8.name: Raw Prime Meat
jyay2dx8.description: A fresh, high-quality piece of animal meat. This stuff isn't easy to come by, so savor it. Cook it to recover more hearts.

jyay2dx9.name: Raw Whole Bird
jyay2dx9.description: This prized meat can be obtained from certain birds. It gets full points for flavor, nutrition, and volume. It pairs perfectly with other ingredients or can be enjoyed alone.

jyay2dxa.name: Razorclaw Crab
jyay2dxa.description: This crab is well known for its exceptionally sharp pincers. When cooked, the strength compound in its claws will increase your attack power.

jyay2dxb.name: Razorshroom
jyay2dxb.description: This mushroom is known for the natural slice in its cap. Eating it fosters your competitive spirit. Use it when cooking to prepare a dish that will increase your strength.

jyay2dxc.name: Red Chuchu Jelly
jyay2dxc.description: A jiggly substance that normally comes from a Fire Chuchu. It constantly gives off heat. If struck, it will explode in a ball of flame.

jyay2dxd.name: Red Lizalfos Tail
jyay2dxd.description: The severed tail of a Fire-Breath Lizalfos. Its flavor makes the flesh inedible, but toss it into a stew with some critters, and you'll have yourself a nice elixir.

jyay2dxe.name: Restless Cricket
jyay2dxe.description: A very energetic cricket. Cook it with monster parts to create a stamina-recovery elixir.

jyay2dxf.name: Rock Salt
jyay2dxf.description: Crystallized salt from the ancient sea commonly used to season meals. Cannot be eaten in this form.

jyay2dxg.name: Ruby
jyay2dxg.description: A precious red gem mined from large ore deposits found throughout Hyrule. Rubies contain the power of fire and have fetched a high price since ancient times.

jyay2dxh.name: Rugged Rhino Beetle
jyay2dxh.description: This beetle's hard body resembles armor. When the shell is cooked with monster parts, the resulting elixir boosts your defense.

jyay2dxi.name: Rushroom
jyay2dxi.description: A mushroom that can grow almost anywhere but prefers ceilings and sheer cliffs. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your movement speed.

jyay2dxj.name: Sanke Carp
jyay2dxj.description: This wild armored carp has been bred into a prizewinning fish. Its beautifully colored markings do not occur in nature. It offers no special effects when cooked.

jyay2dxk.name: Sapphire
jyay2dxk.description: A precious blue gem mined from natural rock formations. Sapphires contain the very essence of ice. They've been known to fetch a high price since ancient times.

jyay2dxl.name: Shard of Dinraal's Fang
jyay2dxl.description: This shard fell from the red spirit Dinraal's fang. It's exceptionally hard and therefore impossible to process, but apparently it can be used as a material for something.

jyay2dxm.name: Shard of Dinraal's Horn
jyay2dxm.description: This shard chipped and fell off the red spirit Dinraal. Its horn is said to be the crystallized power of fire itself. It sells for a high price, but rumors say there's some other use for it.

jyay2dxn.name: Shard of Farosh's Fang
jyay2dxn.description: This shard fell from the golden spirit Farosh's fang. It's so hard, hammers bounce right off it, so it's impossible to process. Yet rumors say it does have some use as a material.

jyay2dxo.name: Shard of Farosh's Horn
jyay2dxo.description: This shard fell off the golden spirit Farosh. It's said the horn is the crystallized power of electricity itself. It sells for a lot, but there must be some other use for it.

jyay2dxp.name: Shard of Naydra's Fang
jyay2dxp.description: This shard fell from the blue spirit Naydra's fang. It's much harder than any metal, so it's impossible to process. Yet rumors say it can be used as a material for something.

jyay2dxq.name: Shard of Naydra's Horn
jyay2dxq.description: This shard chipped and fell off the blue spirit Naydra. It's said the horn is the crystallized power of ice itself. It sells for quite a bit, but rumors say it has some other use.

jyay2dxr.name: Silent Princess
jyay2dxr.description: This lovely flower was said to have been a favorite of the princess of Hyrule. Once feared to have gone extinct, it's recently been spotted growing in the wild.

jyay2dxs.name: Silent Shroom
jyay2dxs.description: A strange mushroom that glows quietly in the forest at night. Cooking it into a dish unlocks the nutrients in its cap, resulting in a meal that will allow you to move stealthily.

jyay2dxt.name: Sizzlefin Trout
jyay2dxt.description: This red trout prefers warm bodies of water. It has a special organ specifically for storing heat. When cooked into a dish, it temporarily boosts your resistance to the cold.

jyay2dxu.name: Smotherwing Butterfly
jyay2dxu.description: This rare butterfly lives in volcanic regions. Its body contains a heat-resistant liquid, which can be turned into a topical elixir that offers resistance to flames.

jyay2dxv.name: Sneaky River Snail
jyay2dxv.description: This large, glow-in-the-dark snail lives in fresh water. When cooked into a dish, it heightens your senses so you can move about silently.

jyay2dxw.name: Spicy Pepper
jyay2dxw.description: This pepper is exploding with spice. Cook with it to create dishes that will raise your body temperature and help you withstand the cold.

jyay2dxx.name: Stamella Shroom
jyay2dxx.description: A green mushroom that grows near trees in the forest. It's chock-full of natural energy. Cook it to release its stamina-restoration properties.

jyay2dxy.name: Staminoka Bass
jyay2dxy.description: This Hyrule bass got to be the biggest fish by never getting caught (until now). Its long life results in a cooked dish that will restore a lot of stamina.

jyay2dxz.name: Star Fragment
jyay2dxz.description: A mysterious stone fragment that fell from the sky. It looks like it would fetch a good price, but you may be able to use it in certain recipes as well.

jyay2dy0.name: Stealthfin Trout
jyay2dy0.description: Consuming the bioluminescent compound that makes this fish glow in the dark will increase concentration. Dishes cooked with it will suppress noise when consumed.

jyay2dy1.name: Summerwing Butterfly
jyay2dy1.description: A butterfly found in the woods and plains of warm regions. Its wings absorb the warmth of the sun. Cook it with monster parts to create an elixir that makes you feel warm and fuzzy.

jyay2dy2.name: Sunset Firefly
jyay2dy2.description: These fireflies glow gently in the dark. When cooked with monster parts, the compound that causes it to glow results in an elixir that will allow you to move more quietly.

jyay2dy3.name: Sunshroom
jyay2dy3.description: A bright red mushroom that grows in hot climates. Imbued with the power of heat, they can be used to cook dishes that will allow you to endure the bitter cold.

jyay2dy4.name: Swift Carrot
jyay2dy4.description: This carrot is cultivated extensively in Kakariko Village. It strengthens the legs and hips when cooked into a dish, which helps increase your movement speed.

jyay2dy5.name: Swift Violet
jyay2dy5.description: This vitality-rich flower blooms mainly on cliffsides. When cooked into a dish, the nourishing compounds increase your movement speed.

jyay2dy6.name: Tabantha Wheat
jyay2dy6.description: This grain is cultivated extensively on the Tabantha Plains. It's ground finely with a millstone to be used in cooking. Use it to make things such as stews and breads.

jyay2dy7.name: Thunderwing Butterfly
jyay2dy7.description: This rare butterfly only shows itself when it rains. The organs in its body produce an insulating compound. When made into an elixir, it offers electrical resistance.

jyay2dy8.name: Tireless Frog
jyay2dy8.description: This rare frog only ventures out in the rain. When cooked with monster parts, the elixir it produces will temporarily increase your maximum stamina.

jyay2dy9.name: Topaz
jyay2dy9.description: This precious yellow gem contains the power of electricity. It's been known to fetch a high price since ancient times.

jyay2dya.name: Voltfin Trout
jyay2dya.description: This trout makes its home in the freshwater lakes. Its scales have an insulating compound that, when cooked into a dish, offers resistance to electricity.

jyay2dyb.name: Voltfruit
jyay2dyb.description: Cacti found in the Gerudo Desert bear this sweet fruit. It's naturally insulated, so when cooked into a dish, it provides resistance against electricity.

jyay2dyc.name: Darner caliente
jyay2dyc.description: Esta libélula tiene un órgano especial que hace que suda profusamente. Cocínalo con partes monstruosas para obtener un elixir que elevará tus temperaturas centrales para que puedas resistir el frío.

jyay2dyd.name: Safflina caliente
jyay2dyd.description: Esta planta medicinal crece en regiones cálidas, como el desierto de Gerudo. Es cálido al tacto y aumenta su resistencia al frío cuando se cocina en un plato.

jyay2dye.name: Jalea De Chuchu Blanco
jyay2dye.description: Una sustancia jiggly que vino de un Chuchu de hielo. Es fresco al tacto, y apretarlo parece aliviar el estrés. Si se golpea, explotará en una niebla fría.

jyay2dyf.name: Baya silvestre
jyay2dyf.description: Una fruta que crece en regiones frías y nevadas, conocida por su sabor dulce y ácido. No ofrece ningún efecto especial, pero es un ingrediente de cocina popular.

jyay2dyg.name: Mariposa de invierno
jyay2dyg.description: Las escamas polvorientas de las alas de esta mariposa refrescan el aire a su alrededor. Verlo revolotear alrededor de los copos de nieve es algo bello. Cocínalo con partes de monstruo para obtener un elixir resistente al calor.

jyay2dyh.name: Madera
jyay2dyh.description: Un paquete de madera portátil. Puedes usar esto para hacer una fogata si tienes algo para encenderla.

jyay2dyi.name: Jalea De Chuchu Amarilla
jyay2dyi.description: Una sustancia jiggly que vino de un Chuchu eléctrico. La electricidad pulsa a través de su masa gelatinosa. Si se golpea, explotará en una explosión de corriente eléctrica.

jyay2dyj.name: Cola amarilla de lizalfos
jyay2dyj.description: La cola cortada de un lizalfos eléctrico. Su hedor potente lo hace poco apetecible y no apto para cocinar, pero es muy apreciado como ingrediente para los elixires.

jyay2dyk.name: Zapshroom
jyay2dyk.description: Este hongo crece de forma silvestre en la región de Gerudo. La tapa está naturalmente aislada, por lo que cuando se usa para cocinar, ofrecerá protección contra la electricidad.
